title: Hot Sauce
directions: In a large pot combine tomatoes, Anaheim peppers, jalapeno peppers, poblano peppers, bell peppers, onion, carrots,  celery, garlic,  vinegar and salt.  Cook over medium heat for 3 hours.
Process in batches in a food processor or blender.  Pour into hot, sterilized jars and seal.  Refrigerate after opening.
